title: How to switch back my move click to the left mouse button.
body: I changed my move click awhile back and now I cant find the folder anymore to attempt to move it back can anyone maybe help?

replies.body:
Your best bet for resetting that left mouse click would be to reset your config files.

- Log into the game client.
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  
- Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know if that helps!
Sorry it took me so long to respond! I tried it and that didn't work out, it only reset my graphics settings and maybe some others that i didn't see.

Hmmmm that's odd. Resetting that should have reverted all of your changes back to their defaults. There might be something else affecting those keybinds, so hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can take a closer look!
